items.title: SWR - React Hooks for Remote Data Fetching
items.description: A lightweight library for remote data fetching using React Hooks. It returns the data from cache, then sends the fetch request and finally comes with the up-to-date data again.

items.title: Colors, fonts and resources for web developers
items.description: Curated library of colors and fonts for Web Developers & Digital Designers and a curated collection of resources.

items.title: Animated CSS Background Generator
items.description: A collection of pure css animated backgrounds with the possibility to customize.

items.title: Fresh Folk - An illustration library of people and objects
items.description: Each character comes with a range of poses, outfits and skin tones. Create a wide range of scenes with 43 Objects to choose from.

items.title: Divjoy - The React codebase generator
items.description: A nice templete generator including marketing pages, contact forms, pricing, faq, authentication and routing.

items.title: Postwoman - An API request builder
items.description: A free, fast, and beautiful alternative to Postman.

items.title: Pika - A new kind of package registry for the modern web.
items.description: It handles formatting, configuring, building and publishing every package on the registry, so that individual authors don't have to.

items.title: Developer Roadmaps
items.description: Step by step guides and paths to learn different tools or technologies.

items.title: Firefox Developer Tools Tips & Tricks
items.description: Curated series of 30 productivity tips and tricks that helps debugging web applications with the Firefox Developer Tools.

items.title: Free for developers
items.description: A list of software (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS, etc.) and other offerings that have free tiers for developers.
